name: apple
description: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree

name: bamboo
description: Bamboo is a member of the grass family. It is a colony plant so it uses energy from this existing plant to produce more plants and expand the root structure

name: cotton
description: Cotton is a soft fluffy staple fiber that grows in a boll or protective case around the seeds of the cotton plants can contain minor percentages of waxes fats pectins and water

name: maize
description: Maize (Zea mays L.) is the worldâ€™s leading crop and is widely cultivated as cereal grain. It is one of the most versatile emerging crops having wider adaptability. Globally maize is known as queen of cereals because of its highest genetic yield potential. Maize is the only food cereal crop that can be grown in diverse seasons ecologies and uses.

name: rice
description: As a cereal grain domesticated rice is the most widely consumed staple food for over half of the world's human population especially in Asia and Africa. It is the agricultural commodity with the third-highest worldwide production after sugarcane and maize.

name: wheat
description: Wheat is a grass widely cultivated for its seed.A cereal grain which is a worldwide staple food.
